hypothesis_content.title: Meme Coin Volatility Explosion Post-BTC Stability
hypothesis_content.statement: During NEUTRAL-BULL transitional periods (regime confidence 50-70%), when BTC 10-day realized volatility is below 40% annualized for 5+ days, and a meme coin (PEPE, DOGE) experiences a >15% price move on elevated volume, buying short-dated (3-7 day) ATM options on that meme coin will capture continued volatility expansion as momentum traders chase the move.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Low BTC volatility creates 'boredom' in crypto markets, causing capital to rotate to high-beta meme coins for excitement. Initial large moves attract momentum traders and social media attention, creating reflexive volatility loops. Options are initially underpriced due to recent low volatility environment.
entry_conditions: Meme coin (PEPE/DOGE) daily return > |15%| on volume > 1.5x 20-day average
Meme coin IV percentile (20-day) < 60% prior to move

exit_conditions.take_profit: Meme coin IV expands to > 80th percentile OR position reaches +40% return
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Meme coin price retraces >50% of initial move OR position reaches -25% return

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Less than 45% of meme coin explosions lead to continued volatility expansion, OR the strategy fails to overcome the high decay of short-dated options in meme coins.
